languages.text: "Сегодня лишь троим удалось совладать с кревециусом, и все они уступают вам в изощренности и скорости вилочной атаки!" {n}Расплескивая напиток, губернатор торопливо поднимает в вашу честь тост.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Какая дуэль! Сегодня лишь троим удалось совладать с кревециусом, и все они уступают вам в изощренности и скорости вилочной атаки! То, как мастерски вы орудовали столовыми приборами, заслуживает кубка, наполненного до краев!" {n}Расплескивая рубиновые капли, восклицает губернатор. Пирующие охотно присоединяются к тосту, нахваливая вашу необычайную скорость реакции.{/n}

languages.text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сегодня лишь троим удалось совладать с кревециусом, и все они уступают вам в изощренности и скорости вилочной атаки!" {n}Расплескивая напиток, губернатор торопливо поднимает в вашу честь тост.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Only three people have managed to match the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of forkcraft!" {n}The Governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink.{/n}

"Only three people have managed to match the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of forkcraft!" {n}The Governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink.{/n}

"Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The Governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

"Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

"Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

languages.text: “今晚只有三位宾客成功征服了五尾虾，但其他人无论是技术还是速度方面，都与您的刀叉技法相距甚远！”{n}总督匆匆忙忙地向你敬着酒，一不小心把酒弄洒了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “今晚只有三位宾客成功征服了五尾虾，但其他人无论是技术还是速度方面，都与您的刀叉技法相距甚远！”{n}总督匆匆忙忙地向你敬着酒，一不小心把酒弄洒了。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Solo tres personas han logrado domeñar al gamboide de esta noche, y ninguna puede compararse a la velocidad y sofisticación con que maneja usted la cubertería!». {n}El gobernador brinda apresuradamente en tu honor, derramando parte de su bebida en el proceso.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Solo tres personas han logrado domeñar al gamboide de esta noche, y ninguna puede compararse a la velocidad y sofisticación con que maneja usted la cubertería!». {n}El gobernador brinda apresuradamente en tu honor, derramando parte de su bebida en el proceso.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu gece imparideslerin üstesinden yalnızca üç kişi gelebildi. Üçü de çatal sanatındaki incelik ve hız bakımından elinize su dökemez!" {n}Vali, aceleyle şerefine kadeh kaldırırken içkisini döküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu gece imparideslerin üstesinden yalnızca üç kişi gelebildi. Üçü de çatal sanatındaki incelik ve hız bakımından elinize su dökemez!" {n}Vali, aceleyle şerefine kadeh kaldırırken içkisini döküyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「今晩、シュリンペリウスを攻略したのはわずか3人だけでしたが、その誰もがあなたのフォークの洗練された動きとスピードには及びませんでした！」{n}総督は慌ててあなたに乾杯し、その途中で飲み物をこぼした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「今晩、シュリンペリウスを攻略したのはわずか3人だけでしたが、その誰もがあなたのフォークの洗練された動きとスピードには及びませんでした！」{n}総督は慌ててあなたに乾杯し、その途中で飲み物をこぼした。{/n}

languages.text: « Seulement trois d'entre nous sont parvenus à vaincre la crevimperius ce soir, mais aucun ne vous arrive à la cheville en matière de maniement de fourchette ! » {n}Visiblement pressé de lever son verre à votre honneur, le gouverneur renverse une bonne partie de sa boisson.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Seulement trois d'entre nous sont parvenus à vaincre la crevimperius ce soir, mais aucun ne vous arrive à la cheville en matière de maniement de fourchette ! » {n}Visiblement pressé de lever son verre à votre honneur, le gouverneur renverse une bonne partie de sa boisson.{/n}

languages.text: "Nur drei Personen ist es heute gelungen, den Shrimperius zu bezwingen, und sie alle sind Euch unterlegen, was Technik und Geschwindigkeit ihrer Gabelkunst anbelangt!" {n}Der Gouverneur prostet dir hastig zu, wobei er sein Getränk verschüttet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Only three people have managed to conquer the shrimperius tonight, and all of them are inferior to you in the sophistication and speed of their forkcraft!" {n}The governor hurriedly toasts you, spilling his drink in the process.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nur drei Personen ist es heute gelungen, den Shrimperius zu bezwingen, und sie alle sind Euch unterlegen, was Technik und Geschwindigkeit ihrer Gabelkunst anbelangt!" {n}Der Gouverneur prostet dir hastig zu, wobei er sein Getränk verschüttet.{/n}
